cui_name: Disease or syndrome of connective tissue and ligaments
reasoning: Broad umbrella category for connective tissue diseases. Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major conditions: systemic lupus erythematosus (6), rheumatoid arthritis (20), ankylosing spondylitis (4), systemic sclerosis (2), dermatomyositis (0.5), Ehlers-Danlos syndrome (1), ligament injuries/sprains (800+), tendinitis/tenosynovitis (15+). Total ~850 per 100k. Very heterogeneous with high overlap in acute musculoskeletal injuries.
